info.title: MOLOCHAIN API Documentation
info.description: API documentation for the MOLOCHAIN global logistics and commodity platform

tags.description: Services Platform v1 API - Mobile-optimized service catalog with 46 services across 19 categories

get.description: Get health status of WebSocket connections
Retrieve the paginated service catalog with 46 services across 19 categories. Supports pagination and returns metadata about total count and available categories.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of services to return (max 500)

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Number of services to skip for pagination

get.description: Retrieve detailed information about a single service by its URL slug, including availability and related services.
Retrieve list of all service categories with service counts (19 categories total).
Search services using full-text search with support for filtering by category and tags.

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of tags to filter by

get.description: Check service availability across different locations.
Get service changes since a specific version for efficient mobile app synchronization.

post.description: Force synchronization with the CMS to refresh service data. Requires admin privileges.
Invalidate all service-related caches. Requires admin privileges.

get.description: Retrieve current synchronization status and statistics. Requires admin privileges.

patch.description: Update a service's cached data (invalidates cache, requires CMS update for persistence). Requires admin privileges.
